content.question: In context, the author’s choice to put the first appearance of the words “mentalist” (paragraph 4, sentence 3) and “behaviorist” (paragraph 6, sentence 1) in boldface serves to

choices.label: differentiate the perspectives described by the two terms from the commonsense point of view
indicate that the author thinks that the perspectives described by the two terms are equally convincing
highlight the relationship between two branches of philosophy that adopt different views about the nature of intelligence
emphasize the contrast between two ways of answering the question of whether computers can be intelligent

content.answer: emphasize the contrast between two ways of answering the question of whether computers can be intelligent

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
